name: Train.io FULL
description:
Train.io is a fast-paced, top-down arcade game set in geometric backgrounds.

Please check out our new game Train.io for those who looking for a pure arcade-styled action and all Snake Game fans!

Welcome to the game, bro! The objective of the game is to control and move a train around a colored area, eat cubes to gain mass, defeat and consume other players.

HOW TO PLAY: Use a tap to change direction.

Game features:
+ snake game 3D
+ laconic graphic design
+ a game to kill time

Enjoy yourself with Train.io brought to you by Survival Worlds Apps! The game is a perfect reaction time test to check your reflexes.
